summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated April 17, 2010. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information is privileged and intended for the addressee only. It emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.
